serialization.name: Button - Native
serialization.description: Renders a clickable button in each row of a column using the jsx3.gui.NativeButton class. In the EXECUTE event, the CDF record id is available with this.emGetSession().recordId. Honors the @jsxdisabled and @jsxnomask CDF attributes.

events.jsxexecute: jsx3.log('Clicked on button mask in row ' + this.emGetSession().recordId + '.');
